___foursight_uuid.description: Timestamp equivalent to the Foursight UUID of the check used to generate this update.
___foursight_uuid.comment: Date can be submitted as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___foursight_uuid.title: Foursight UUID

___start_date.description: Start (earlier) date of the data release update. The update is in form <start_date> to <end_date>
___start_date.comment: Date can be submitted as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___start_date.title: Start Date

___end_date.description: End (later) date of the data release update. The update is in form <start_date> to <end_date>
___end_date.comment: Date can be submitted as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___end_date.title: End Date

___update_items.description: Array of objects representing items within the update.
___update_items.title: Update Items

___secondary_ids.description: Array of the secondary (explanatory) items of the update. May be the same as the primary.
___secondary_ids.title: Secondary IDs

___additional_info.description: Info that will be added to the secondary item
___additional_info.title: Additional info

___primary_id.description: linkTo for the primary object of the update.
___primary_id.title: Primary ID

___parameters.description: Any string parameters used to generate the update
___parameters.title: Report Parameters

___update_tag.description: Name of the update tag, specified from the Foursight check used to create this. Serves as the primary grouping mechanism for data release updates.
___update_tag.title: Update Tag

___is_internal.description: A flag to indicate whether this data release update was run considering 'to project' statuses (e.g. released to project). True if so.
___is_internal.title: Is Internal

___severity.description: Integer severity from 0 (least severe) to 3 (most severe)
___severity.title: Severity

___comments.description: Any wrangler comments on the update to be displayed
___comments.title: Comments
